title: Gabby Allen stuns fans with semi naked bum video as she vows to 'build confidence'
text:

Gabby Allen shocked followers of her Instagram page with a close-up video of her gyrating her pert bottom.

The former Love Island star stripped down into a pair of revealing high waisted thong bikini pants, as she admitted she was trying to build up her confidence.

It's been a rough few weeks for Gabby who split from her Rak-Su beau Myles Stephenson in August, amid claims he was unfaithful.

Gabby, 27, said she'd thrown herself in the gym after her heartbreak and wanted to show off the results of her training with her fans.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But Gabby was still appearing indecisive, as she wrote in her caption: "Didn’t know whether to post this. Might delete later."

She went on to explain that ploughing herself into exercise had been the perfect remedy for the dark times in her personal life.

"The main thing that gets me through day to day is the working on myself how I know best: training. That’s why I’m uploading this video," Gabby explained.

"I’m concentrating on me from now on. From the inside, out and from the outside, in. When sh***y things happen, it knocks your confidence and unfairly it’s up to yourself to build it back up again. But yanno what, I’ve done it once, and I’ll do it again," she vowed.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The video showed Gabby flexing her glutes from a variety of angles and showing off her very taut stomach.

She ended the clip by doing a shimmy and blowing a kiss to the camera.

Gabby was soon inundated with praise from her followers in the comments, with many encouraging her not to take down the post

Fellow ex islander Anna Vakili wrote: "Oh my goshhhhh do not date deletee," before adding that Gabby had inspired her to start training.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

At the end of August Gabby confirmed that her relationship with X Factor winner Myles Stephenson was over after a year of dating.

She made the announcement while also cryptically asking any fans with any information regarding Myles to come forward.

Gabby tweeted: "The news paper articles are true. I am no longer in a relationship. I hope youse have all had a better week than me!'

She also said that she'd been told information about her relationship before adding: "If anyone else has anything they need to tell me, please do."

The pair began dating in September 2018 with things moving fast with Myles moving into Gabby's home and telling reporters he wanted to propose to her.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images Europe)

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

Gabby previously dated Love Island co-star Marcel Sommerville.

A source told The Sun that Marcel slept with someone else while he and Gabby were on a romantic break to Mexico.

Marcel admitted at the time he'd made a 'huge mistake'.

He told new! Magazine: "I'm upset. I'm sad. Like, I made a mistake and there's nothing I can do.

"I do love her and I do miss her, but there's nothing you can do about it."
description: The Love Island star is a self confessed gym bunny and wanted to flaunt the results of her training
